title: Are Arihant maths books good for the JEE Advanced? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes! Arihant books are well known for their MCQ's. They contain all type of questions that came in past years and other stuff too. I won't say that they can cover 100% of what JEE demands from an aspirant but to many extent they are quite helpful.Just go for them!
Yes You can use Cengage, Balaji too.. Best Wishes Satnara IIT AIIMS Academy (an initiative by IITians.. ) Mayur Vihar, Delhi
